author: AriX Alliance | Clash of Clans
description: Multi-cog framework for the AriX Alliance, built on Discord Red Bot.
install_msg:
Welcome to AriX!
The AriX Clash system is made out of 3 separate cogs, and they must be loaded in the following order:```1) aa_datamgr
2) aa_leadercog
3) aa_membercog```Cogs #2 and #3 are optional but recommended.
